select a.id as "id", a.name as "name", a.percent as "percent", a.is_tax as "isTax", a.is_filing_fee as "isFilingFee", case ifnull(a.account,'0') when '0' then c.account else a.account end as "account" from bm_rule_item a left join bm_rule_office b on b.rule_id=a.rule_id left join bm_account c on c.office_id=b.office_id
a.rule_id=#{ruleId}
